item.title: How to Deploy Machine Learning Model With Python
item.description: Today we’ll se how to deploy a machine learning model with fastapi. We’ll start with a simple example of a fastapi server that can classify the content of an image. Let’s start with our project structure ▾ <root>/ ▾ src/ __init__.py prediction_model.py settings.py ▾ models/ mobilenet_v2.h5 main.py I like to have a settings.py file to store project base settings, as Django does. We will start by populating the settings.py file with useful values, as the base directory, the model directory etc, this will come in handy later.
